description: A classic Indian appetiser with a difference, which adds peas and spices for an extra hit of flavour.
name: Pea & Onion Bhaji Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 medium white onions, peeled and sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180Â°C. In a bowl, mix the flour with the cornflour and then incrementally add the water until you reach a consistency for a nice batter.
Now add the vegetables to the flour mix and combine fully. Pack the mix into small hand size patties and shallow fry with the olive oil for 2 minutes each side.
Carefully remove the patties from the shallow fry, transfer to a baking tray and bake for 10 minutes or until lightly browned on the outside.
